forumNotes.author: megaborg
forumNotes.content:
Hi, i've a 8Gb usb key and i would like to save on it my livexpram.iso  
I see in tutorial section but pe2usb seems impossible to use with an 8gb usb key  
there's another program to do that and which is the correct way to save livexpram on it?  
thanks

forumNotes.author: was_jaclaz
forumNotes.content:
> Hi, i've a 8Gb usb key and i would like to save on it my livexpram.iso  
> I see in tutorial section but pe2usb seems impossible to use with an 8gb usb key  
> there's another program to do that and which is the correct way to save livexpram on it?  
> thanks

Make your choice/tests:  
[http://www.boot-land...?...ic=7739\&hl=](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/index.php?showtopic=7739&hl= "External link")  
[http://www.911cd.net...o...c=21702\&hl=](http://www.911cd.net/forums//index.php?showtopic=21702&hl= "External link")  

You just save the .iso on it, as you would do with any normal file.  

If you use "external" SETUPLDR.BIN/winnt.sif, copy them to the stick BEFORE the .iso file.  

Alternatively, if you use grub4dos (included in **fuwi** 's app), you need just the .iso file, see this:  
[http://www.boot-land...?showtopic=5041](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/index.php?showtopic=5041 "External link")  

jaclaz
